definition: (of water) to rise/rising tide/(of women) to get one's period
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to be prompted by a sudden impulse/carried away by a whim/to have a brainstorm

sentences.english: When pneumothorax occurs temporally with menstrual cycles, catamenial pneumothorax should be suspected.
sentences.chinese: 当气胸发生在月经来潮时要怀疑胸腔子宫内膜异位症。

sentences.english: Clothing has always been subject to change based on the dictates of fashion and whims.
sentences.chinese: 衣着往往随着时尚潮流的趋势和心血来潮而发生变化。

sentences.english: Oviposit date of the female is in commonly next time menstruation comes before tide 14 days or so.
sentences.chinese: 女性的排卵日期1般鄙人次月经来潮前的14天阁下。

sentences.english: Still, I am not fully confident in these newly formed values.
sentences.chinese: 可是，我仍然无法全盘接受这心血来潮的观念。

sentences.english: On the first day of your period, you fill out a questionnaire.
sentences.chinese: 在月经来潮第一天，填写调查表。

sentences.english: Cut do not purchase a disharmonious furniture because of temporarily be seized by a whim.
sentences.chinese: 切不要因一时的心血来潮而购置一件不和谐的家具。

sentences.english: The pharmacist says that sanitary products for menstruating women are simply not available.
sentences.chinese: 药剂师说，他们没有供应妇女月经来潮时的清洁用品。

sentences.english: She brainstormed and bought a hat.
sentences.chinese: 她心血来潮买了一顶帽子。
相反，你可以一时的心血来潮，买花给她一个惊喜。

sentences.english: I got up really early today just for going to the gym.
sentences.chinese: 我今天心血来潮，起了个大早跑到健身中心一阵猛练。

sentences.english: Was leaving your job at Schwab a risky thing or are you a person who doesn't have such fears?
sentences.chinese: 你心血来潮做这个，那么离开嘉信理财是一次冒险吗？

sentences.english: Pre-menstrual cramps, dizziness and a woman who will, is a precursor to cancer.
sentences.chinese: 女人月经来潮前会有头晕者，是癌症的前兆。

sentences.english: As Mrs. Weston observed, 'all young people would have their little whims.
sentences.chinese: 正如韦斯顿太太所说的，“年轻人都有点心血来潮。”

sentences.english: The pill prevents your body from making hormones involved in ovulation and menstruation.
sentences.chinese: 避孕药使机体不产生排卵和月经来潮相关的激素。

sentences.english: This is best done when you are menstruating.
sentences.chinese: 这是最好的做当您月经来潮。

definition: luteal phase (period in the menstrual cycle when an embryo can implant in the womb)
to stop menstruating (as a result of pregnancy, menopause or medical condition etc)
corpus luteum (glands in female mammals producing progesterone)
(of a married couple) to have intercourse/(literary) to share the same room/of the same family branch
